Type%20Aliases.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK11.name: HTTPHeaders
Type%20Aliases.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK11.abstract: Key-value data type, used in http request headers.

Type%20Aliases.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK8J.name: JsonData
Type%20Aliases.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK8J.abstract: Key-value data type, usually used for response format.

Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK30VG.name: VGSSDKErrorInputDataIsNotValid
Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK30VG.abstract: Error key, used for errors when input data is required to be not empty or to be valid only, but is not valid.

Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK28VG.name: VGSSDKErrorInputDataRequired
Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK28VG.abstract: Error key, used for errors when input data is required to be not empty but is empty or nil.

Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK33VG.name: VGSSDKErrorInputDataRequiredValid
Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK33VG.abstract: Error key, used for errors when input data is required to be valid is not valid.

Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK23VG.name: VGSSDKErrorFileNotFound
Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK23VG.abstract: Error key, used for errors when SDK can’t find the file at file path. Can happened when file changes the path or doesn’t exist.

Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK31VG.name: VGSSDKErrorFileTypeNotSupported
Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK31VG.abstract: Error key, used for errors when file type is not supported by SDK.

Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK34VG.name: VGSSDKErrorFileSizeExceedsTheLimit
Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK34VG.abstract: Error key, used for errors when file size exceeds maximum limit.

Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK29VG.name: VGSSDKErrorSourceNotAvailable
Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK29VG.abstract: Error key, used for errors when SDK can’t get access to specific source.

Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK39VG.name: VGSSDKErrorUnexpectedResponseDataFormat
Error%20Keys.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK39VG.abstract: Error key, used for errors when response for SDK API request is in format that not supported by SDK.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.name: inputDataIsNotValid
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.abstract: When input data is not valid, but required to be valid

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.name: inputFileSizeExceedsTheLimit
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.abstract: When file size is larger then allowed limit

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.name: sourceNotAvailable
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.abstract: When can’t get access to file source

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.name: unexpectedResponseDataFormat
Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.abstract: When reponse data format is not supported

Classes/VGSError.html.name: VGSError
Classes/VGSError.html.abstract: An error produced by VGSCollectSDK. Works similar to default NSError in iOS.

Errors.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK0A14SDKErr.name: VGSCollectSDKErrorDomain
Errors.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK0A14SDKErr.abstract: An error domain string used to produce VGSError from VGSCollectSDK - “vgscollect.sdk”

Classes/CardState.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.name: last4
Classes/CardState.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.abstract: Last 4 digits of the valid card number from associated VGSTextField with field configuration type FieldType.cardNumber.

Classes/CardState.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.name: bin
Classes/CardState.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.abstract: Bin digits of the valid card number from associated VGSTextField with field configuration type FieldType.cardNumber.

Classes/CardState.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.name: cardBrand
Classes/CardState.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.abstract: Credit Card Brand of the card number from associated VGSTextField with field configuration type FieldType.cardNumber.

Classes/CardState.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.name: description
Classes/CardState.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.abstract: Message that contains CardState attributes and their values.

Classes/State.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK5St.name: description
Classes/State.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK5St.abstract: Message that contains State attributes and their values

Enums/Environment.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.name: sandbox
Enums/Environment.html#/s:13VGSCollectSD.abstract: Should be used for development and testing purpose.

Classes/VGSCollect.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.name: sendData(path:method:extraData:completion:)
Classes/VGSCollect.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.abstract: Send data from VGSTextFields to your organization vault.

Classes/VGSCollect.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.name: sendFile(path:method:extraData:completion:)
Classes/VGSCollect.html#/s:13VGSCollectS.abstract: Send file to your organization vault. Only send one file at a time.

Classes/VGSCollect.html.name: VGSCollect
Classes/VGSCollect.html.abstract: An object you use for observing VGSTextField State and send data to your organization vault.

Classes/State.html.name: State
Classes/State.html.abstract: An object that describes VGSTextField state. State attributes are read-only.

Classes/CardState.html.name: CardState
Classes/CardState.html.abstract: An object that describes VGSCardTextField state. State attributes are read-only.

Protocols/VGSFilePickerControllerDelegat.name: filePickingFailedWithError(_:)
Protocols/VGSFilePickerControllerDelegat.abstract: On error occured when user pick a file.

Classes/VGSFilePickerConfiguration.html#.name: fieldName
Classes/VGSFilePickerConfiguration.html#.abstract: Name that will be associated with selected file by user. Used as a JSON key on send request with file data to your organozation vault.

Classes/VGSFilePickerController.html#/s:.name: delegate
Classes/VGSFilePickerController.html#/s:.abstract: VGSFilePickerControllerDelegate - handle user interaction on file picking.

Classes/VGSFilePickerController.html.name: VGSFilePickerController
Classes/VGSFilePickerController.html.abstract: Controller responsible for importing files from device sources.

Enums/VGSFileSource.html.name: VGSFileSource
Enums/VGSFileSource.html.abstract: Available file source destinations that VGSFilePickerController can work with.

Classes/VGSFileInfo.html.name: VGSFileInfo
Classes/VGSFileInfo.html.abstract: An object that holds optional files’ metadata on selecting file through VGSFilePickerController.

Enums/CradIODataType.html#/c:@M@VGSColle.name: expirationDate
Enums/CradIODataType.html#/c:@M@VGSColle.abstract: Credit Card Expiration Date. String in format “01/21”.

Enums/CradIODataType.html#/c:@M@VGSColle.name: expirationMonth
Enums/CradIODataType.html#/c:@M@VGSColle.abstract: Credit Card Expiration Month. String in format “01”.

Enums/CradIODataType.html#/c:@M@VGSColle.name: expirationYear
Enums/CradIODataType.html#/c:@M@VGSColle.abstract: Credit Card Expiration Year. String in format “21”.

Enums/CradIODataType.html#/c:@M@VGSColle.name: cvc
Enums/CradIODataType.html#/c:@M@VGSColle.abstract: Credit Card CVC code. 3-4 digits string in format “123”.

Protocols/VGSCardIOScanControllerDelegat.name: userDidFinishScan()
Protocols/VGSCardIOScanControllerDelegat.abstract: On user confirm scanned data by selecting Done button on Card.io screen.

Protocols/VGSCardIOScanControllerDelegat.name: userDidCancelScan()
Protocols/VGSCardIOScanControllerDelegat.abstract: On user press Cancel buttonn on Card.io screen.

Protocols/VGSCardIOScanControllerDelegat.name: textFieldForScannedData(type:)
Protocols/VGSCardIOScanControllerDelegat.abstract: Asks VGSTextField where scanned data with VGSConfiguration.FieldType need to be set. Called after user select Done button, just before userDidFinishScan() delegate.

Classes/SwiftLuhn/CardType.html#/s:13VGS.name: cardLengths
Classes/SwiftLuhn/CardType.html#/s:13VGS.abstract: Returns array with valid card number lengths for specific SwiftLuhn.CardType

Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.name: none
Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.abstract: Field type that doesn’t require any input formatting and validation.

Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.name: cardNumber
Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.abstract: Field type that requires Credit Card Number input formatting and validation.

Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.name: expDate
Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.abstract: Field type that requires Expiration Date input formatting and validation.

Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.name: cvc
Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.abstract: Field type that requires Credit Card CVC input formatting and validation.

Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.name: cardHolderName
Enums/FieldType.html#/s:13VGSCollectSDK9.abstract: Field type that requires Cardholder Name input formatting and validation.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.name: fieldName
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.abstract: Name that will be associated with VGSTextField and used as a JSON key on send request with textfield data to your organozation vault.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.name: isRequired
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.abstract: Set if VGSTextField is required to be non-empty and non-nil on send request. Default is false.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.name: isRequiredValidOnly
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.abstract: Set if VGSTextField is required to be valid only on send request. Default is false.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.name: formatPattern
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.abstract: Input data visual format pattern. If not applied, will be set by default depending on field type.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.name: divider
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.abstract: String, used to replace not default VGSConfiguration.formatPattern characters in input text on send request.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.name: keyboardType
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.abstract: Preferred UIKeyboardType for VGSTextField. If not applied, will be set by default depending on field type parameter.

Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.name: keyboardAppearance
Classes/VGSConfiguration.html#/s:13VGSCo.abstract: Preferred UIKeyboardAppearance for textfield. By default is UIKeyboardAppearance.default.

Protocols/VGSTextFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.name: vgsTextFieldDidEndEditingOnReturn(_:)
Protocols/VGSTextFieldDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: VGSTextField did resign first responder on Return button pressed.

Classes/VGSTextField.html#/s:13VGSCollec.name: textAlignment
Classes/VGSTextField.html#/s:13VGSCollec.abstract: The technique to use for aligning the text.

Classes/VGSTextField.html.name: VGSTextField
Classes/VGSTextField.html.abstract: An object that displays an editable text area in user interface.

Classes/VGSCardTextField.html.name: VGSCardTextField
Classes/VGSCardTextField.html.abstract: An object that displays an editable text area. Can be use instead of a VGSTextField when need to detect and show credit card brand images.
